svg.script: document.animate = function(){ var isAnimated = false; var animatedElement = document.getElementById("blue-line"); animatedElement.setAttribute("class", "line animated"); animatedElement.addEventListener("animationstart", function(){ isAnimated = true; }); if (animatedElement.addEventListener){ animatedElement.addEventListener("animationend", function(){ var elemArr = document.getElementsByClassName("additional"); for (var i = elemArr.length - 1; i>=0 ; i-- ){ elemArr[i].setAttribute("class", "line additional animated"); } }) }else if (animatedElement.attachEvent){ animatedElement.attachEvent("animationend", function(){ var elemArr = document.getElementsByClassName("additional"); for (var i = elemArr.length - 1; i>=0 ; i-- ){ elemArr[i].setAttribute("class", "line additional animated"); } }) } setTimeout(function(){ if(!isAnimated){ var elemArr = document.getElementsByClassName("additional"); for (var i = elemArr.length - 1; i>=0 ; i-- ){ elemArr[i].setAttribute("class", "line additional animated"); } } },1000) }
